reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoying this device. It is super easy to use and so effective. Can set it to do a steady stream of steam or pulse it. It does a fantastic job of taking out wrinkles. The tank is a decent size. Only criticism is that it's difficult to get all the unused water out of the tank when you're done, but that's typical for devices with water tanks. Easier to just steam it all out. Very happy, so much better than busting out an iron and ironing board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For my non ironing peiole
reviews.reviewText: I hate irons. I can never find minimal ones that’s easy to store and don’t take up space regarding the long ironing boards and whatnot and when I do they’re too small to do a decent job. This is my first steamer ever and I am obsessed, I’m mad at everyone that didn’t put me on sooner lol. I know a lot of people don’t prefer a steamer but as someone who’s more for convenience and a minimalist with stuff in my home, I love it and would definitely recommend if you’re the same
